name: solidification
content:
solidification noun [U]
(OF LIQUID/GAS)
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act or process of changing from being a liquid or gas to a solid form, or of making something do this: a process of gradual solidification He devoted himself largely to problems involving the solidification of gases.
More examplesFewer examplesSupercooled water is cooled below the freezing point of water without solidification into ice.If solidification of the lava has commenced, crystals are usually present.Contact with the neighbouring rock caused more rapid cooling and solidification.
